Key Match Events: The Pistons outscored Charlotte 14-12 in the fourth, hitting 30% (6 of 20) of their shots while Charlotte went 4 for 19 (21.1%)
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons held off the Charlotte Hornets 98-94 for their fifth win in six games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlotte only got nine offensive rebounds to Detroit's 14
Detroit played its first game since Jaden Ivey broke his left leg in Wednesday's win over Orlando
Others: The Hornets have lost nine in a row
The Pistons came back to outscore the Hornets 32-17 in the third quarter
